data.name: Individual World
data.rules:
Complete episodes 1-7.
In Bianco Hills, you may skip episode 1.
In Pinna Park, you may perform Early Yoshi Go-round instead of episodes 5 and 6.
All forms of Gelato Beach Skip are banned.
Do not use FLUDD in secret levels.


- Timing starts when you select the first shine and ends when Mario holds up the final shine.
- 1st place runs must include video.
- Emulator, SD and USB are all banned.
